text: thæcring phracea khxng phwk cea nan khux xal lxx hu phuthrng srang brrda chan fa læa phændin phaynı hk wan læw sthity xyu bn lang lang k phraxngkh thrng hı klangkhun khrxng khlum klangwan nı sphaph thi klangkhun li tam klangwan doy rwdrew læa thrng srang dwng xathity læa dwng canthr læa brrda dwngdaw khun doy thuk kahnd hı kahnd tha hnathi brikar tamph ra baycha khxng phraxngkh phung ru theid wa kar srang læa kickar thanghlay nan pen siththi khxng phraxngkh theanan mha brisuththi xallxh phu pen phracea hæng sakl lok
